law.catch_line: Applicability of State law governing operation.

text.section:
Sec. 7-21. Applicability of State law governing operation.
The laws of the State of Florida, as may be amended from time to time, governing the operation of motorboats be and the same are hereby enacted by this reference as regulations pertaining to the operation of motorboats applicable to all waters lying within the boundaries of Dade County.
